actions.name: BatchAssociateClientDeviceWithCoreDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a list of client devices with a core device

actions.name: BatchDisassociateClientDeviceFromCoreDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a list of client devices from a core device

actions.name: CancelDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a deployment
dependentActions: iot:CancelJob                                                                                        iot:DeleteThingShadow                                                                                        iot:DescribeJob                                                                                        iot:DescribeThing                                                                                        iot:DescribeThingGroup                                                                                        iot:GetThingShadow                                                                                        iot:UpdateJob                                                                                        iot:UpdateThingShadow

actions.name: CreateComponentVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a component

actions.name: CreateDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a deployment
dependentActions: iot:CancelJob                                                                                        iot:CreateJob                                                                                        iot:DeleteThingShadow                                                                                        iot:DescribeJob                                                                                        iot:DescribeThing                                                                                        iot:DescribeThingGroup                                                                                        iot:GetThingShadow                                                                                        iot:UpdateJob                                                                                        iot:UpdateThingShadow

actions.name: DeleteComponent
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a component

actions.name: DeleteCoreDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a AWS IoT Greengrass core device, which is an AWS IoT thing. This operation removes the core device from the list of core devices. This operation doesn't delete the AWS IoT thing

actions.name: DescribeComponent
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata for a version of a component

actions.name: GetComponent
actions.description: Grants permission to get the recipe for a version of a component

actions.name: GetComponentVersionArtifact
actions.description: Grants permission to get the pre-signed URL to download a public component artifact

actions.name: GetCoreDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieves metadata for a AWS IoT Greengrass core device

actions.name: GetDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to get a deployment

actions.name: ListClientDevicesAssociatedWithCoreDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of client devices associated to a AWS IoT Greengrass core device

actions.name: ListComponentVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of all versions for a component

actions.name: ListComponents
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of component summaries

actions.name: ListCoreDevices
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of AWS IoT Greengrass core devices

actions.name: ListDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieves a paginated list of deployments

actions.name: ListEffectiveDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieves a paginated list of deployment jobs that AWS IoT Greengrass sends to AWS IoT Greengrass core devices

actions.name: ListInstalledComponents
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of the components that a AWS IoT Greengrass core device runs

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

actions.name: ResolveComponentCandidates
actions.description: Grants permission to list components that meet the component, version, and platform requirements of a deployment

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource
